channel.title: Gluon gun bug:)
channel.description: [https://youtu.be/AdgSj6ZdoAw](https://youtu.be/AdgSj6ZdoAw) That's the link to the video, it explains itself. But for those that are too lazy to watch it: If you fire the gluon gun whilst zooming in, you can shoot it infitely. It doesn't drain any ammo and still works completly fine.
